body_html: The problem is that size_t does not match perfectly with any of the constructors of Scalar. The temporary solution is to replace the size_ts with int64_t or ssize_t. I will need to add another constructor to Scalar or an overload to operator[].
body_text: The problem is that size_t does not match perfectly with any of the constructors of Scalar. The temporary solution is to replace the size_ts with int64_t or ssize_t. I will need to add another constructor to Scalar or an overload to operator[].
body: The problem is that `size_t` does not match perfectly with any of the constructors of `Scalar`. The temporary solution is to replace the `size_t`s with `int64_t` or `ssize_t`. I will need to add another constructor to `Scalar` or an overload to `operator[]`.
